PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Act 1-5 Gems+Links written down
Act 1: Take Freezing Pulse Buy Raise Zombie "Freezing Pulse-Arcane Surge"
After Tidal Island: Take Frostblink, SrS, Summon Phantasm
Prison Waypoint ( lvl 8 ) Take Minion Damage Buy Infernal Legion "SrS-Minion Damage-Infernal Legion"
After Brutus: Take Summon Skeletons Buy Flame Dash
Merveil WP: Take Flesh Offering Buy Smoke Mine, Minion Damage ______________________________________
Act 2: After Chamber of Sins Take Desecrate Buy Skitterbots
After Weaver Take Elemental Focus Buy 2x Melee Physical "Skeleton, Minion Damage, Melee Physical" "Zombie, Minion Damage, Melee Physical" ________________________________________
"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""" Act 3-4:
"SrS-Infernal Legion-Minion Damage- Ele Focus>Unleash" "Skeletons-Zombis-Minion Damage-Melee Phys" "Chaos Golem-Stone Golem-Feeding Frenzy-Convocation" "Carrion Golem-Minion Damage-Melee Phy>Brutality-Mele Splash>Multistike" "Flame Dash-Smoke Mine-Desecrate" "Flesh Offering-Skitterbots-Purity of Elements"
"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""" Act 3: Take Purity of Elements Buy Convocation
WP before Lunaris Take Raise Spectre
Library (Siosa) Take Feeding Frenzy Buy Blood Magic, Second Wind (Only buy if you have enough chance orbs. Future golems cost chance orbs aswell.) __________________________________________
Act 4: After Dried Lake Take Carrion Golem Buy Stone Golem
After Eternal Nightmare Quest Take Multistrike Buy Chaos Golem, Multistike _____________________________________________ Act 5:
Lilly Gem Shop Buy Pride, Animate Guardian, Impale, Maim, Flesh and Stone, Dread Banner "ALL for the Offhand as leveling gems"
Act 5+
"Chaos Golem-Stone Golem-Feeding Frenzy-Convocation" "Skeletons-Zombis-Minion Damage-Melee Phys" "Carrion Golem-Minion Damage-Melee Phy>Brutality-Mele Splash>Multistike" "Raise Spectre-Blood Magic-Descrate-Vulnerability" "Flame Dash-Smoke Mine-Second Wind" "Flesh Offering-Skitterbots-Purity of Elements"
